thread.title: These are the dirtiest things in your hotel room
thread.title_full: These are the dirtiest things in your hotel room

author: More Content Now
title: These are the dirtiest things in your hotel room
text: These are the dirtiest things in your hotel room Comment Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 2:47 PM By More Content Now Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 2:47 PM Â» Social News Business Insider recently rounded up a list of the dirtiest things in your hotel room (based off of results from a University of Houston study), and the results will amaze (and disgust) you. (For example, around 80 percent of the surfaces tested by researchers were found to have traces of fecal bacteria. Ick!) Which two items topped the list? - TV remotes: Unsurprisingly, TV remotes were ranked as the absolute dirtiest thing in your hotel room. - The bedside light switch: Bedside light switches are another item covered in germs. The researchers also found that headboards and curtain rods were among the least contaminated surfaces in hotel rooms. Read the full list and watch the video at Business Insider. By More Content Now
